- Alice in Wonderland

Scroll
Alice: Which way should I go?
Cat: That depends on where you are going.
Alice: I don’t know.
Cat: Then it doesn’t matter which way you go.”
- Alice in Wonderland
MONDAYS
NEW WEEKLY EVENT COMING SOON
Stay tuned!
TUESDAYS
SPIN THE WHEEL TO WIN PRIZES
Spend $10 and Spin the Wheel for a chance to win free drinks!
WEDNESDAYS
DRAG QUEEN BINGO
Join the fabulous Alexis De La Mer for Drag Queen Bingo every Wednesday at 9pm! Experience a night of laughter, entertainment, and fabulous prizes. Each week money is raised for a different non-profit .. $10 for 10 games, along with a 50/50 raffle… Win fun prizes! (All funds raised go to the non-profit!)
$3 Kava shells all day and night (Unicorn & Faceplant only)
THURSDAYS
NEW WEEKLY EVENT COMING SOON
Stay tuned!
FRIDAYS
KARAOKE
Every Friday (but the last one of the month) Come sing the night away! Our host Michelle has any and every song you can think of, held inside on the dance floor area with the words on the huge projector screen. (Some nights are themed, keep an eye on our social media for those nights) 9pm-Close
Last Friday of every month is our Sip & Paint. $10 covers all supplies. 7pm-11pm
$5 Bombs all day & night!
SATURDAYS
ZEN MARKET & DRUM CIRCLE
First Saturday of every month has our parking lot full of local vendors, along with a big drum circle jam session. Come out and jam! 8pm-11pm (Interested in vending? Show up before 8pm to secure a spot… No fee to set up!)
*If parking is full, please park across the street in the shopping plaza
All You Can Drink Kava $25 Noon-8pm (Unicorn & Faceplant only)
SUNDAYS
FREE POOL & OPEN MIC NIGHT
Free pool open to close! We have plenty of board games, cards, ping pong, pin-ball and other activities for you to enjoy if Pool is not your flavor.
Open Mic Night with AL on the patio! Play an instrument? Come jam.. maybe read some poetry, tell some jokes.. the stage is yours! 7pm-?
CHECK OUR SOCIAL MEDIA FOR ADDITIONAL SPECIAL EVENTS!
Weekly Events at Mad Hatters Kava Bar
Event Gallery

Scroll
“HAVE I GONE MAD? I'M AFRAID SO. YOU'RE ENTIRELY BONKERS.
BUT I WILL TELL YOU A SECRET,ALL THE BEST PEOPLE ARE.”
- Alice in Wonderland
Relax and unwind in our eccentric atmosphere.
Mad Hatters is an award-winning kava bar and hookah lounge in St. Petersburg, offering a variety of exciting menu items and weekly events. We serve exotic teas like kava, kratom, and herbal loose leafs, along with nitro coffee, cold brew, kombucha, and boba milk teas. Our hookah service is available any time we're open. Whether you're looking for a fun weekend spot or a quiet place to work during the week, we have something for everyone.
END .sqs-gallery-meta-container
READ ABOUT US IN:
Creative Loafing
Tampa Bay Times
“
Hatters is legit the first spot I stop the moment I land in the Bay area. Every single time. Best environment in the state. If you do not come here you are doing yourself a disservice to your entire life.
”
— Joe Santaniello
“
Very laid back atmosphere! Great place to come and sit with a very cool group of individuals. I go to think and just take a hour or so to myself when needed. I can shoot a game pool, darts or just relax and do nothing. PERFECT!!!
”
— Patty Ballengee
“
Great atmosphere, super friendly staff. The painted walls are super cool, obviously all alice and wonderland themed. The drinks are super tasty, my favorite is the dark chocolate version of the naughty or nice blended drink with green. Has games, hookah, pool, outdoor seating.
”
— Amber DiPaolo
“
I love Mad Hatters such a cool place to hang out. Very open and accepting. Always a fun crowd of people to be around. Great place to make friends. Fun events. Also, love the kartom drinks
”
— Destiny Wright
“
I love this place! Open 24/7, great staff, clean, safe and a great place to meet people from all walks of life. If you are looking to go out and have fun without alcohol involved, this is the place!
”
— Donald Clair
Read more google reviews →
